content: Back in NYC, and the city's energy is like no other. Just had the best slice of pizza from Joe's Pizza on Carmine Street.
Diving back into work with a fresh perspective. Starting a deep dive into our trading algorithms. Time to make some real contributions.
Met with my mentor, Alex. He gave me some invaluable insights into risk management. Feeling more prepared to tackle market volatility.
Joined a workshop on AI in finance. The future of trading looks incredibly exciting. Networking with some sharp minds.
